title: Renegotiation of the Aerodom Contract
description: Legal counsel to the Ministry of the Presidency of the Dominican Republic in the renegotiation of the concession contract for the country's main airport with Aeropuertos Dominicanos Siglo XXI (AERODOM).

title: Public Asset Recovery (ERPP)
description: Appointment of Fernando P. Henríquez as General Coordinator of the Agreement Monitoring Team, for the regulation, organization, and legal coordination of Dominican State asset recovery processes.

title: Energy Contract Modification (PPA)
description: Legal representation of Montecristi Solar 3 S.R.L. in the modification of its PPA (Power Purchase Agreement) in the context of a renewable energy investment.

title: Syndicated Financing (Energas 4)
description: Legal representation of Manzanillo Gas & Power, S.A.S. in the modification of its energy purchase agreement with EDEESTE, in the context of a strategic energy investment.

title: Mass Transit Legal Audit
description: Independent legal audit for the Trust for the Development of the Mass Transit System of the Dominican Republic (FITRAM) on public procurement processes linked to mass transit projects.

title: International Sports Infrastructure Development
description: Legal counsel to the San Pedro de Macorís Electricity Company (CESPM) in the structuring and closing of an international syndicated financing for the construction of a power generation plant.
